mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , A.CUSTOMER_SUPPORT_CODE , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.STATUS , A.CREATE_DATE , A.ACTION , B.NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME , C.NAME AS EMP_NAME , D.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME , E.NAME AS CHANNEL_NAME FROM customer_support A LEFT JOIN customer B ON A.CUM_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN employee C ON A.EMP_ID = C.ID LEFT JOIN support_category D ON A.CATEGORY_ID = D.ID LEFT JOIN channel E ON A.CHANNEL_ID = E.ID WHERE A.ID = #{id}
